faq.a1: X-Streamify is your personal digital vault where you can upload, store, and stream your movies, documents, photos, and family memories — all in your own private cloud library.
faq.a2: Yes. X-Streamify helps you manage your own legally owned media. Laws vary by region, so you should only upload content you own and have the right to digitize for personal use.
faq.q3: Can I access my library on any device?
faq.a3: Yes — once uploaded, you can access and stream your movies, documents, and photos on phones, tablets, smart TVs, and computers using your private account.
faq.q4: Do I need special equipment to digitize my DVDs?
faq.a4: No — you don’t need complex equipment. A compatible DVD drive and our simple upload tools make digitizing your DVDs easy. X-Streamify is also working toward providing a seamless hardware solution for subscribers.
faq.q5: What file types can I upload?
faq.a5: You can upload common video formats like MP4, MKV, AVI, and MOV, most standard image formats, and widely used document files. Our system is designed to support a broad range of media types for smooth and secure access.
faq.q6: Will my uploads stay private and secure?
faq.a6: Absolutely. Your uploads remain private and secure. Files are encrypted during transfer and stored in your private vault with strict access controls. Only you can see your uploads.
faq.q7: Can I share my library with family members?
faq.a7: Yes — you can add family members to your account and control what each person can access. Every profile can have its own permissions and personalized library experience.
faq.q8: How do I upload my DVDs to X-Streamify?
faq.a8: It’s simple — insert your DVD into your computer (or the X-Stream Port), use the X-Streamify Uploader to digitize it, and it’s automatically added to your personal library.
faq.q9: Can I upload Blu-ray, standard DVDs, or 4K discs?
faq.a9: Yes — X-Streamify supports standard DVDs, Blu-ray, and 4K Ultra HD discs. Insert your disc into a compatible drive or the X-Stream Port, and our uploader handles the rest.
faq.a10: Yes — X-Streamify works worldwide. As long as you have an internet connection, you can securely access your personal library from anywhere.
faq.q11: How fast is streaming after upload?
faq.a11: Streaming is fast and seamless — once upload and processing are complete, your content is ready to play within minutes.

privacy_intro: We respect your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and how we protect it when you use our platform and services.
privacy_info_collect_intro: We collect different types of information depending on how you interact with the platform, including the following categories:
privacy_direct_info_1: Account registration details such as name, email address, and profile preferences
privacy_direct_info_2: Information submitted through forms, settings, or support communications
privacy_direct_info_3: Any other information you voluntarily choose to provide
privacy_user_content_1: Media, files, or data you upload, store, or manage through the platform
privacy_user_content_2: Metadata associated with uploaded content, such as filenames or timestamps
privacy_user_content_3: Content organization preferences and usage context
privacy_technical_info_1: Device, browser, and operating system information
privacy_technical_info_2: Log data, access times, and interaction patterns
privacy_technical_info_3: Information necessary to maintain security, performance, and reliability
privacy_use_info_intro: We use the information we collect to operate, maintain, and improve the platform in a secure, reliable, and user-focused manner. Information is used for the following purposes:
privacy_platform_ops_1: Creating and managing user accounts and profiles
privacy_platform_ops_2: Providing access to features, tools, and stored content
privacy_platform_ops_3: Processing requests and actions initiated by users
privacy_content_mgmt_1: Storing, organizing, and retrieving user-uploaded content
privacy_content_mgmt_2: Ensuring content is delivered accurately and securely
privacy_content_mgmt_3: Maintaining continuity of access across sessions and devices
privacy_security_1: Protecting against unauthorized access, misuse, or abuse
privacy_security_2: Monitoring system activity to maintain platform stability
privacy_security_3: Complying with applicable legal and operational requirements
privacy_support_1: Responding to inquiries, requests, or support issues
privacy_support_2: Sending important service-related notices or updates
privacy_support_3: Informing users about changes that affect their use of the platform
privacy_data_sharing_intro: We do not sell personal information. We share information only when necessary to operate the platform, comply with legal obligations, or protect users and the service.
privacy_service_providers_1: Third-party providers that support infrastructure, hosting, storage, or security
privacy_service_providers_2: Access is limited to what is necessary to perform their services
privacy_service_providers_3: Providers are required to protect information and use it only as instructed
privacy_legal_1: When required by applicable law, regulation, or legal process
privacy_legal_2: In response to lawful requests from public authorities
privacy_rights_1: To enforce policies, terms, or agreements
privacy_rights_2: To protect the security, rights, or safety of users, third parties, or the platform
privacy_security_measures_intro: We implement reasonable technical, administrative, and organizational safeguards designed to protect information against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction.
privacy_footer_note: This page is provided for transparency and clarity. It applies to this platform and related services.
